analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ExToke.swap (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#151-158):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(oldAddress).transferFrom(msg.sender,tokenAdmin,sendAmount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#153-158)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenSwapSupply (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol)

Reentrancy in ExToke.swap (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#151-158):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(oldAddress).transferFrom(msg.sender,tokenAdmin,sendAmount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#153-158)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol)

ExToke.update (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#59-70) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nextRelease < 24 && block.timestamp > releaseDates[nextRelease] (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#59-63)

ExToke.fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#109-121) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- finishTime < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#116-121)
	- finishTime >= block.timestamp && crowdSaleSupply >= msg.value * 100000 (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#110-121)

ExToke.releaseDivTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#121-133) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > releaseDates[nextRelease]) (/unique_chucks/31/0x54a7c606ea45f9b20cff8dbe232cdf6146cb7d26.sol#122-124)
